audience: Freelancers and small product teams that need clear project visibility.

features.title: Unified Project View
features.description: Tasks, files, and updates in one place.

features.title: Client Updates
features.description: Share progress clearly without extra meetings.

testimonials.quote: We cut status meetings in half and still stayed aligned.

testimonials.quote: The team finally has one source of truth.

faq.question: Is this for small teams?
faq.answer: Yes, it is designed for freelancers and compact teams.

faq.question: Can clients see progress?
faq.answer: Yes, with read-only updates and clear reporting.
